ygData.subject: Re: Gargoyle Island in OOT
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You have become better at kiting (107) ... I think the question was whether you could do it solo without kiting.  Clearly you couldn t once you got 2 gargs
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 16 Feb 2000, Peck White wrote:
>
> meantime I started using Bellow on the first garg. I found that with Selo's
> I was moving too fast to stay in range and let Selo's drop. It turns out
> that gargs fly at the same speed that we run, so I just kept up a normal run
> and bellowed until garg number one bit the dust. I then started in on garg

You have become better at kiting (107)

:)

I think the question was whether you could do it solo without
kiting. Clearly you couldn't once you got 2 gargs on you.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
